title: Ski Into Love
overview: Manga artist Wei Zhi loses her pen name and copyrights after a scandal, turning to skiing for a fresh start. At Beishan Snow Resort, she encounters coach Shan Chong, a former snowboarder. Wei Zhi's determined skiing practice and her connection with Shan Chong led to mutual feelings. Shan Chong, inspired by Wei Zhi, returns to training, seeking to reclaim his love for snowboarding.
